name: The Amazing Mr. Meat-Tangle
description:
Assume the role of the Amazing Mr. Meat-Tangle, appendage contortionist extraordinaire!  Use your stupendous flexibility to entertain (or mortify) your jaw-gaped audience!

NOTE: The goal of the game is technically to make your shadow match the shape on the wall, but there isn't any functionality to determine whether the shadow is the correct shape, so you can 'honor system' your way through it if you'd like.

Game created for the Weekly Game Jam - Week 103

Created by Connor Robb (SecretJuice1)

Music and Sounds Edited by Anne Robb 

Title Art and 'Mr. Meat-Tangle' Character by Anne Robb

Music by Kevin Maclaud

Hand Model by João Martins: https://www.cgtrader.com/free-3d-print-models/science/biology/hand-with-golf-bal.. 

Curtain Graphics from pngtree.com
